design_philosophy.identity: Modern Guinguette - A fusion of rustic French charm and contemporary elegance.
design_philosophy.vibe: A warm, atypical tavern-canteen under a majestic cedar tree. Not a stiff fine-dining spot, but a high-end place to live and eat well.

images.description: Outdoor terrace with warm string lights and trees at dusk - captures the 'Guinguette' vibe.
Rustic tables and cozy corner - represents the 'atypical' interior.
Elegant gourmet plating of asparagus and bread.
Stove with pots, authentic cooking vibe.

visual_assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (Menu, Chevron, Star, MapPin, Phone). Use thin stroke width (1.5px) for elegance.

motion.entrance: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.6, ease: 'easeOut' }} viewport={{ once: true }}
motion.parallax: Use 'framer-motion' useScroll/useTransform for subtle parallax on the Hero image.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text on images has a dark overlay (bg-black/30 or bg-black/50).

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors and fonts defined above. Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css'.
3. COMPONENTS: Create a 'Navbar' that is sticky and glassmorphic. Create a 'Footer' with the big tree concept (maybe a stylized SVG tree or just the wood color).
4. HERO: Build a full-screen hero with the 'hero_background' image. Center the title 'Le Gros Arbre' in the 'Fraunces' font. Add the Google Rating badge (4.4/5) prominently.
5. MENU: Do not use a simple list. Create a 'Bento Grid' or 'Masonry' layout for the menu categories (Entr√©es, Plats, Desserts). Use the food images to break up the text.
6. RESERVATION: Use Shadcn 'Dialog' or a dedicated section with a clean form. It must be the primary conversion goal.
7. MAP: Embed a styled Google Map (grayscale or muted colors) to match the site theme.
8. MOBILE: Ensure the 'Reserve' button is always accessible (sticky bottom on mobile or in the navbar).

do_not: Do NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings.
Do NOT use pure black (#000000). Use the defined charcoal (#1A1F1C).
Do NOT make the site look like a generic SaaS. It must feel like a physical place.
do: DO use 'text-balance' on headings for better typography.
DO add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
